title: Convert to Exponential Form
text: First, convert the expression to exponential form. To convert a logarithmic equation to exponential form, we need to identify the base of the exponential, a, and the exponent $$y$$ since $$y=\log_{a}\left(x\right)$$ is equivalent to $$x=a^y$$.
